mapper.sql: ANL_VAR_ID, HST_SNO, SCT_VAL, SCT_NM, SCT_STR_VAL, SCT_END_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID
mapper.select:
-- 변수 히스토그램 조회 by 변수ID ... SELECT
FROM WAD_VAR_HST WHERE ANL_VAR_ID = #{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY HST_SNO
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_VAR_HST (ANL_VAR_ID, HST_SNO, SCT_VAL, SCT_NM, SCT_STR_VAL, SCT_END_VAL, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID) values (#{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sctVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sctNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WAD_VAR_HST
ANL_VAR_ID,
HST_SNO,
SCT_VAL,
SCT_NM,
SCT_STR_VAL,
SCT_END_VAL,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID,
#{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sctVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sctNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sctStrVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{sctEndVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1, 'C', now(), #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAD_VAR_HST
SCT_VAL = #{sctVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCT_NM = #{sctNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCT_STR_VAL = #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SCT_END_VAL = #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ANL_VAR_ID = #{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HST_SNO = #{hstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAD_VAR_HST set SCT_VAL = #{sctVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCT_NM = #{sctNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCT_STR_VAL = #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCT_END_VAL = #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1, REG_TYP_CD = 'U', WRIT_DTM = now(), WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ANL_VAR_ID = #{anlVarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HST_SNO = #{hstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
